name: Hell Breaker
description: VR Dungeon game with bHaptics Tactsuit
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 Processor: Intel core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 390 or NVIDIA Geforce GTX 980 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700HQ CPU @ 2.81 Ghz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1070 Storage: 1 GB available space
